description: The PB_TX_SET_CREDIT table specifies the premium billing detailed transactions credited for a payment transaction set.

columns.name: PB_TXSET_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing transaction set.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line counter for the credit on the transaction set.

columns.name: CR_PB_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the detailed premium billing transaction associated with the credit.
